data.text:
QUICK FACTS

Activity Actress

Nationalities Great Britain, Nepal

Born July 19, 1997 (Nepal)

BIOGRAPHY

Amita Suman is a Nepalese and British actress, born on July 19, 1997, in Nepal. Her family moved to Brighton, England, when she was seven years old. There she approached the arts and became interested in acting during her time at Sussex Downs College. Amita graduated from the Academy of Live and Recorded Arts in South London, and after graduating in 2018, Suman made her debut in small television roles in series such as Casualty (2018) and Aclkey Bridge (2018). These first participations have been followed by work in popular television series such as Doctor Who (2018), The Outpost (2019) and Shadow and Bone (2021).
